price: Sila inni tokkolleen isa irratti hin danda'uu yaadaa?
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabu an lan yaqdira ʿalayhi aḥadun
